blocks.title: More Great Workflow Automation Tools
blocks.content: Build databases with Airtable and Notion, or use n8n to create complex workflows that integrate with your favorite services.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Automation Tools Upgrade Now Lite

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/integrations/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Automation Tools Learn More Lite

blocks.title: Skip the Upload, Just Record
blocks.content: Allow your customers to take a photo or record a video in real time using their mobile device or webcam. Whether you use the new Camera field or the updated File Upload field, capturing visual information is now faster and easier than ever.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Camera Field Upgrade Now Lite

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/announcing-camera-field/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Camera Field Learn More Lite

blocks.title: PDF Addon: Everything You Asked For (and then some)
blocks.content: Attach a PDF to entries or create documents, invoices, certificates, and more with over a dozen fully customizable templates to choose from.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=PDF Addon Upgrade Now Lite

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/announcing-pdf-addon/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=PDF Addon Learn More Lite

blocks.title: Form Themes For Everyone
blocks.content: Change colors, backgrounds, and borders with native controls. With full support for the Block Editor, Elementor, and now in our very own Form Builder, you can easily style your form no matter how you manage your site.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/docs/styling-your-forms?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Form Themes Try It Out Lite

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/announcing-form-themes-for-all/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Form Themes Learn More Lite

blocks.title: Save Time on Manual Entry Exports
blocks.content: Schedule recurring exports, set up task sequences, and make sure every submission lands where it needs to, automatically with the Entry Automation addon.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Entry Automation Addon Upgrade Now Lite

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/announcing-entry-automation/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Entry Automation Addon Learn More Lite

blocks.title: Square Got a Major Upgrade
blocks.content: See real-time payment statuses through webhooks and set up and manage recurring subscription payments. Oh, and Square is now available to everyone!

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/announcing-square-webhooks/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=Square Addon Learn More Lite

blocks.title: Generate Advanced Formulas with AI Calculations
blocks.content: Simply describe what you want to calculate and create dynamic calculations. Real-time validation ensures your calculations are always accurate.

main.url: https://wpforms.com/wpforms-lite-upgrade/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=AI Calculations Upgrade Now Lite

alt.url: https://wpforms.com/announcing-ai-calculations/?utm_source=WordPress&utm_campaign=liteplugin&utm_medium=Whats New Splash&utm_content=AI Calculations Learn More Lite

blocks.title: Powerful New Integrations
blocks.content: Power up WPForms with brand new integrations for Google Drive, Mailpoet, Pipedrive, Zoho CRM & Make.
